Zymergen (https://www.zymergen.com) is a bioengineering company utilizing artificial intelligence / machine learning and robotics. -) Top 6 Artificial Intelligence Startups (https://themerkle.com/top-6-artificial-intelligence-startups/)-) Ranked one of the top 100 private AI companies (https://www.cbinsights.com/research-ai-100)-) One of the top-funded startups using AI globally (http://www.bizjournals.com/sanjose/news/2016/11/28/bay-area-dominates-this-years-ai-funding-here-are.html?ana=twt)Now hiring for: *Sr ChemoInformatics Engineer*Sr BioInformatics Engineer*Sr Solutions Engineer - no travel, simply working with our internal customers [View req: http://grnh.se/l2xndw1]*Sr Java Engineer*Sr Python Engineer / AKA Pythonista*Technical Writer - APIsDM me if interested in an opportunity.

Sr Technical Sourcer / Recruiter, Digital Transformation (remote contract)

Interested in completely reimagining how a Fortune 100 company builds mobile products? The Core Mobile team at American Express has an executive mandate to do just that. We’re led by startup veterans and responsible for both our flagship Android and iOS apps as well as new product experimentation. As part of developing these products, we're also building tools and frameworks to make the rest of American Express Technology more productive. At American Express, we are unique in the fintech industry with a ubiquitous international closed-loop ecosystem of merchants and consumers as well a staggering amount of transaction and behavior data that we are leveraging to invent the future of mobile commerce.During my 2 years here, successfully filled various teams and openings, including:Smart Card technology team (TSM, Applets, EMV): Director, Sr Engineers, SW Eng in TestEmerging Mobile Payments team: Sr SW Engineers, SW Eng in Test, Technical Project ManagersPega (certified with either CSSA, LSA or CLSA) Oracle Data Architects & EngineersJava Backend EngineersFront-End JavaScript/CSS3/HTML5 NinjasUI/UX EngineersSFDC (SalesForce.com) EngineersBig Data (Hadoop, HBase, HDFS, Pig, Hive, Sqoop, Flume, Oozie, Avro etc)

Founded in 2008, Cloudera pioneered the business case for Hadoop with CDH, the world's most comprehensive, thoroughly tested and widely deployed 100% open source distribution of Apache Hadoop in both commercial and non-commercial environments. Today Cloudera offers enterprises a powerful new data platform built on the popular Apache Hadoop open-source software package. We unlock the storage and processing technologies of the world’s biggest Web, telecom, medical, financial and government companies by allowing our growing list of global customers to easily and efficiently use Hadoop to solve problems and profit from all their data.I sourced candidates for Hadoop Solutions Architects & Solutions Consultants for the Professional Services team and Technical Pre-Sales Engineers for the Field Sales team. Regions consisted of North America, EMEA and APAC.
Short term contract. Sourcing for HarrisWest clients in the San Francisco Bay Area, focusing on Mobile Apps / Gaming. iOS, Android, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, AWS.

Software Engineer, Authorizations Technology at American Express
September 7, 2016, Bandita was a client of Scott’s

Job hunt is never an easy process and usually the recruiter is the first point. Working with an unresponsive and uncooperative recruiter can increase stress. I was fortunate to have worked with Scott during my hiring process at American Express. He made the entire process a smooth ride for me, keeping me posted at every step, right from scheduling the interviews till the day I received the offer. After I received the offer, he was extremely responsive to my emails ensuring that I had all my questions answered and had all the information necessary to complete the joining formalities. Also, since I had to relocate to a new city where I did not know anyone, Scott was kind enough to provide me with accommodation suggestions and things to do around. With this level of connection, Scott has been a pleasure to work with and I would definitely recommend his services as a technical recruiter.

summary: Resourceful and aggressive Senior Technical Recruiter and Sourcer with over 18 years of experience in Corporate, Start-up, Agency and Government recruiting & sourcing involving both permanent and contractor staffing. Possesses a mastery of all aspects of applicant sourcing (direct, indirect and Internet). Regarded for my strong work ethic, organizational skills, superior communication and listening skills, and the ability to partner effectively with all levels of management in order to achieve staffing objectives in a timely and cost effective manner.  My 'inner geek' is in my sourcing. I keep current on latest Sourcing trends and am a strong user of Social Networking for passive candidate identification (SocialTalent, CyberSleuth, SourceCon, AIRS, etc). Being around me for <5 minutes will show how crazy I am about new ways to find top candidates, purple squirrels and thrive on challenges!
